column4: Install all (downloaded) Munki updates daily at 20:00 automatically. PLEASE NOTE: This will also install updates of software which is currently running on the computer. Better you save your files before and restart the mac after the updates.

Install all (downloaded) Munki updates on Thursday at 23:00 automatically. PLEASE NOTE: This will also install updates of software which is currently running on the computer. Better you save your files before and restart the mac after the updates.

See https://github.com/munki/munki for more details.

If you need to remove munki, please follow the instructions from: https://github.com/munki/munki/wiki/Removing-Munki

This small script write the login name of the current user to the file “/usr/local/default_user_and_group.cfg” to change the owner of some new munki software, later. The script will be store in '/usr/local/sbin/setup_current_user_as_default_user_for_apps.sh‘.

This is a special version of iTunes which allows to use the AppStore to buy, download and install iOS Apps. But it will replace iTunes 12.7 and newer from the system and can have some security leaks. If you had installed iTunes 12.7 before, you should pressing the „alt“ key during the first start of this iTunes version, to create a new iTunes library or restore your older iTunes library from an backup. To reinstall the newest version of  itunes please download iTunes from the Apple website: https://www.apple.com/de/itunes/download/

column4:
„... MunkiAdmin is a GUI for managing munki repositories. It is written with Objective-C and uses in-memory Core Data store as a backend.
... Code is considered stable and it shouldn't have any major issues. However, MunkiAdmin is not feature-complete so be prepared to see bugs. If you decide to run this on a production repo, make sure your backups are current or you have some other methods for going back in time. I'm using git version control on my munki repositories so I'll always know what was changed.
You can continue to use your favorite text editor to edit pkginfo files and manifests. MunkiAdmin is designed to complement your current workflow and it doesn't require any configuration or changes to your munki repository. ...“ from the web page
